text:
New #RCOphth guidelines for retinal monitoring in #hydroxychloroquine and #chloroquine users. 

https://t.co/DR3Y0tg9yl

@RheumatologyUK @HealthySkin4All @rcgp 

Key messages:
- Baseline testing NOT recommended
- Retinal imaging - 1st line
- Visual field testing - 2nd line https://t.co/BFr9UKjIC3
